Your channel

Clicking on your name will take you to your channel, where you can get set up for your own livestream.

Schedule

Here you can find our schedule which will show you upcoming streams in a category you are interested in.

Edit your channel

This allows you to edit your channel and add details about what you are streaming.

Chat

Up here you can pop out the chat, moderate any spammers and change your username colour in the chat.

You can't donate to yourself.

django docker opensource python webapp

A series of livecasts on the development of Mirigata, a simple site for sharing interesting links.

The goal of this series is to show how you can quickly create a proof of concept using Python and Django, and get it live as soon as possible.

Although the main focus is Python/Django, I will also pay some attention to other tools and techniques, such as:

  • HTML/CSS
  • Javascript
  • Git
  • MySQL
  • Docker
  • etc. etc. etc.

Feel free to use the chat to ask me questions
